knimeNode.name: Parallel Chunk End (multi port)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Represents the end of a parallel chunked flow.

fullDescription.intro: Represents the end of a parallel chunked flow. It collects the results from all parallel executions on up to three ports and concatenates them.

ports.inPort: The first data chunks arriving from the parallel branches.
The second data chunks arriving from the parallel branches.
The third data chunks arriving from the parallel branches.
ports.outPort: The aggregated data from all parallel chunks of the first branch.
The aggregated data from all parallel chunks of the second branch.
The aggregated data from all parallel chunks of the third branch.
